attributes.action: Lower Petrol Prices Or Have A Fixed Petrol Price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the prime minister to lower petrol prices by at least 20-70% and to make all petrol stations to have a fixed price since some could be 1.98 ir 1.65

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
